Conditions1: Welcome to the (Munasaba) application. Please read the terms and conditions carefully before using the website or application.
Conditions2: Your browsing or adding any ad on our platform is your acknowledgment of having read and accepted the terms and conditions.
Conditions3: Munasaba Company owns the (Munasaba) application and website, which provides a space for advertisements for its users (sellers and buyers).
Conditions4: Munasaba's role is limited to providing a space for the seller and buyer to meet easily, and it does not bear any responsibility.
Conditions5: Munasaba is limited to providing a space for the seller and buyer to meet in a way that does not require Munasaba.
Conditions6: No responsibilities or guarantees are provided to users, including the existence of new products and purchases.
Conditions7: No claims for compensation can be made for any damages.
Conditions8: Instructions and rules for posting an ad:
Conditions9: Ads are listed after registration with a mobile phone number and email, and the advertiser must classify the ad and publish it in the correct section, and the ad title, product description, price, and images must be written correctly, and the product must be real and available.
Conditions10: The seller must be the owner of the services or service, ads must be commercial or on behalf of others. Ads of a personal nature are prohibited. It contains restrictions on posting ads with words or images that violate public morals or are illegal, and any advertisement about celebrities or organizations is prohibited.
Conditions11: Advertising the sale of weapons of all kinds, whether licensed or unlicensed, is prohibited. Each ad should only be about one item, and in case of multiple items, a separate ad must be created for each item. Advertising lawyers aimed at promoting the lawyer himself or attracting clients is prohibited.
Conditions12: Advertising prohibited by the laws in the country where the advertisement originates is also prohibited. Similarly, advertising prohibited by the laws in the State of Kuwait, especially Law No. 63 of 2015 on combating electronic laws, Law No. 38 of 2002 on the legislation of the law on the declaration of health materials. Advertising for medicines and sexual enhancers is prohibited.
Conditions13: All types of advertising related to smoking, whether traditional or electronic, are prohibited. The sale of endangered plants and animals listed in the CITES agreement is also prohibited, according to the decisions and regulations of the General Environment Authority. Advertising for domestic workers of all types is prohibited, as well as the publication of advertisements related to fictitious workers or renting workers for homes.
Conditions14: Advertising all types of human trafficking is prohibited. No advertisement for gambling or objections or advertisements for sorcery and witchcraft is allowed. No advertisement for alcohol or alcoholic beverages of any kind is allowed, and advertising for drugs and shisha of any kind is prohibited.
Conditions15: The sale and display of listening devices and means to incite the misuse of telephone devices are prohibited, according to Law No. 9 of 2001 regarding the misuse of telephone communication devices and listening devices.
Conditions16: Advertising for loan repayment and issuance is prohibited, as is advertising for investment and calling for investment and commercial participation.
Conditions17: Since the administration of the (Munasaba) application is entitled to ban any phone number used for abuse or harm to others or if the application is used for illegal purposes, the user must respect other users.
Conditions18: Reserving advertisements or fixing ads for the purpose of selling them to another party is prohibited, and the user assumes responsibility for any legal liability or any compensation without any responsibility on the (Munasaba) application.
Conditions19: The client agrees to review all specific and general terms and conditions for using the site's services and with his limited acceptance and agreement to them, he assumes legal responsibility (criminal and civil) for any damage caused to the site or guides or others in case of violation of laws and regulations.
Conditions20: And the decisions governing the advertisement and all the laws and lists and other decisions governing the advertisement and all other laws and decisions in force in the country, including his entry to the site or using the services available on it as an acknowledgment and commitment from him.
Conditions21: The advertiser providing craft work must obtain a license from the competent authorities to practice the activity, and users of the application are required to ensure the existence of the necessary documents and licenses before contracting with service providers, without any responsibility on the (special application).
Conditions22: In the absence of a license to practice the activity for the advertiser providing craft services, the ad will be canceled, and official staff will be provided with the seller's information whenever the administration of the (special application) requests it. The administration has the right to prevent any user who does not comply with the application conditions.
Conditions23: Users can communicate with each other through chats and voice messages, and they can also comment on ads and reply to comments.
Conditions24: Users can report inappropriate content or inappropriate individuals, as well as block inappropriate users and not see their ads or comments.
